explanation: The original second line used A//B + 1 to try to compute the ceiling of A/B. That is incorrect when A is an exact multiple of B because it adds 1 unnecessarily (e.g. A=6, B=3 gives 6//3+1 = 3+1 = 4). I replaced that line with the standard integer ceiling formula (A+B-1)//B which returns the correct ceil(A/B) for positive integers without changing any other lines.
